attributes.action: MP maxium term of office of 3 terms or 12years which ever is the shorter term
attributes.additional_details: Any member of parliment should only be allowed to remain in office for a maaxium period of 12 yeras or 3 Parlimentary terms ( general Elections) No other person in this country has a job for life.Members of Parliment should be no diferrent from the people they are there to serve.If they havn't sorted it out in 12 years then they are not going too.
